Abilities: Check one person each night for suspicious activity.

Attributes:
-You will know if your target is a member of the Mafia.
-You will know if your target is a Serial Killer.
-Cannot detect Detection Immune roles

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Note(s):
-The Godfather and Arsonist are detection immune. They will appear non-suspicious for you.
-Framed players will appear to be a Framer.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target seeks justice. Therefore your target must be a Sheriff, Retributionist, or Executioner.
Consigliere - Your target is a protector of the town. They must be a Sheriff.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town

Abilities: Investigate one person each night for a clue to their role.

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Note: Framed players will appear to be a Framer.

Message When Investigating:
Bodyguard, Jailor, or Lookout - Your target is a protector.
Transporter or Arsonist - Your target smells of gas.
Doctor or Serial Killer - Your target works with knives.
Consort or Escort - Your target is a manipulative beauty.
Investigator or Consigliere - Your target gathers information.
Godfather or Mayor - Your target is a leader among men.
Sheriff, Retributionist, or Executioner - Your target seeks justice.
Spy or Blackmailer - Your target works with secret information.
Veteran, Vigilante or Mafioso - Your target works with weapons.
Disguiser or Jester - Your target enjoys tricking people.
Janitor or Medium - Your target works with dead bodies.
Framer - Your target is good with documents.
Amnesiac - Your target does not remember their role.
Survivor or Witch. - Your target is a loner.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target gathers information. They must be an Investigator or Consigliere.
Consigliere - Your target gather information. They must be an investigator

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town

Abilities: You can secretly listen to the Mafia at night.

Attributes:
-You can read private messages.
-You can anonymously hear the Mafia talk at night.
-You will know who the Mafia visit at night.

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Note: Spy keeps his abilities while dead, making him very useful to Town if it has a Medium.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target has secret information. They are either a Spy or Blackmailer.
Consigliere - Your target secretly listens in on private conversations. They must be a Spy.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town

Abilities: Watch one person at night to see who visits them.

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Special Abilities: Ignores Detection Immunity

Notes:
-You will see a Jailor visit their target even if they are not executed.
-You will still be shot by the Veteran if you choose to watch them at night.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target is a protector. They must be a Bodyguard, Jailor, or a Lookout.
Consigliere - Your target watches who visits people at night. They must be a Lookout.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town
